[@mix](@ye+QM09iPcDJD6YvQYjoQc7sLF/IFhmNbEqgdzQo3lQ=.ed25519) 

Yeah! [@Neale](@J233HHh6iMA7LxT+KnCbtI3GeaCJ7gW7dkB/63ObSJY=.ed25519) showed me Spirited Away and I loved it, but I'm pretty sure I haven't seen the others. I'm not sure about Howl's Moving Castle but it *feels* familiar. I'll push those to the top of the list, somehow I hadn't heard of Nausicaa before.
